content:
This chunk appears in the `scheduleThread` method of the `TaskThreaded` class. It is responsible for registering and managing a new thread with the TaskManager by adding it to internal sets (`__taskNames` and `__threads`) before scheduling it using Panda3D's task manager system.

self.__taskNames.add(taskName)
                self.__threads.add(thread)
                taskMgr.add(Functor(self._doThreadCallback, thread, taskName),
                            taskName)
